name: Descent 1
description: My first DM map, and if I do say so myself, it's come out quite nice. Originally was gonna be a Slaughter DM map, but I got fired(ahem), so now I'm using it for my own evil purposes. For those who might be wondering, Descent is the name of a song by Fear Factory, and my naming it Descent 1 instead of just Descent DOES imply that there will be more out.
